messages: The color of the product isn't specified, but since the "testing" product is free, you won't need to make a payment. If you have any questions or concerns about the product, feel free to ask.
how do I get my account suspended

To clarify, you're asking about getting your account suspended, but I'm not sure how it relates to the "testing" product. Could you please provide more context or information about your concern? I'm here to help with any questions about the product or payment methods, such as FPS (轉數快).
when will I get a human answer

You've asked when you'll get a human answer, but I'm here to assist you with the "testing" product. Since the product is free, you won't need to make a payment using FPS (轉數快). If you have any questions about the product, feel free to ask, and I'll do my best to help.
when will I get a human answer

I understand you're looking for a human answer, and I'm here to help with any questions or concerns you have about our store or products. If there's anything I'm not able to assist you with, don't worry, a human team member will be with you shortly to provide further support.

I understand you'd prefer to speak with a human, and I apologize if I've not been able to fully address your concerns. I'm here to help with any questions or issues related to our store or products. If there's anything I'm not able to assist you with, a member of our customer support team will be with you shortly to provide further support.
